solution_line_template: Miss Davis gave a total of {popsicle_sticks_per_group} x {num_groups} = <<{popsicle_sticks_per_group}*{num_groups}={total_given_out}>>{total_given_out} popsicle sticks to the {num_groups} groups in her class.
So, she is left with {initial_sticks} - {total_given_out} = <<{initial_sticks}-{total_given_out}={sticks_left}>>{sticks_left} sticks.
